EmailTemplate.name: EDUT - Close Ticket - Without Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: [EDUT] Ticket# {!Case.CaseNumber} has been closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Ticket #{!Case.CaseNumber}
Thank you for your recent inquiry to the Nokia Global Contact Center. Our team has completed work on your issue and we will now close your ticket. We hope that you have had a positive experience with the Global Contact Center.
If you have additional questions or require further assistance, please feel free to email the NokiaEDU Global Contact Center through gcc.nokiaedu@nokia.com.
It is our pleasure to assist you with your learning.
Kind Regards, NokiaEDU
Global Contact Center
